caption.center: BABATUNDE S. LAWAL, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Hillsborough County; Diana M. Allen, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Edward M. Albrecht of Edward M. Albrecht, P.A., Land O'Lakes, for Appellant.
Robert A. Butterworth, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and John M. Klawikofsky, Assistant Attorney General (withdrew after briefing); Jonathan P. Hurley, Assistant Attorney General (substituted as counsel of record), Tampa, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
CAMPBELL, A.C.J., and GREEN and DAVIS, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
